name: Mint
tagline: Fresh and fragrant - perfect for beginners!
description: Aromatic herb that grows quickly and is very forgiving
watering_guide: Keep soil consistently moist but not waterlogged
sunlight_guide: Place near a bright window but avoid direct afternoon sun
potting_tips: Use well-draining soil and repot when roots show at bottom
common_issues: Overwatering can cause root rot; underwatering causes wilting

name: Basil
tagline: Kitchen superstar that loves the sun!
description: Popular culinary herb that needs consistent care
watering_guide: Water when top inch of soil is dry
sunlight_guide: Needs bright direct sunlight for best flavor
potting_tips: Use rich potting soil and pinch flowers to encourage leaf growth
common_issues: Can bolt in hot weather; watch for aphids

name: Snake Plant
tagline: Hard to kill and great for your air!
description: Nearly indestructible plant that purifies air
sunlight_needs: Tolerates low light but prefers bright indirect
watering_guide: Water only when soil is completely dry
sunlight_guide: Can survive in low light but grows faster with bright indirect light
potting_tips: Use well-draining soil; can go months without water
common_issues: Overwatering is the main issue; very drought tolerant

name: Cherry Tomatoes
tagline: Homegrown flavor in your own space!
description: Compact tomato variety perfect for containers
sunlight_guide: Needs full sun for best fruit production
potting_tips: Use large container with support; fertilize regularly
common_issues: Watch for pests and diseases; needs consistent watering

name: Chilli
tagline: Spice up your life with homegrown heat!
description: Hot peppers that add flavor to any dish
watering_guide: Water when top inch of soil is dry
sunlight_guide: Needs full sun for best fruit production
potting_tips: Use well-draining soil; support heavy fruit with stakes
common_issues: Can be sensitive to overwatering; watch for aphids

name: Marigold
tagline: Bright and cheerful - nature's mood booster!
description: Colorful flowers that bloom all season
watering_guide: Water when soil feels dry to touch
sunlight_guide: Thrives in full sun; flowers close at night
potting_tips: Deadhead regularly to encourage more blooms
common_issues: Generally pest-free; can get powdery mildew in humid conditions

name: Spider Plant
description: Produces plantlets that you can propagate
sunlight_guide: Prefers bright indirect light but tolerates low light
potting_tips: Perfect for hanging baskets; easy to propagate
common_issues: Very forgiving; brown tips indicate over-fertilization

name: Peace Lily
tagline: Elegant beauty that tells you when it's thirsty!
description: Beautiful flowering plant that's easy to care for
watering_guide: Water when soil is dry; plant will droop when thirsty
sunlight_guide: Prefers low to medium light; avoid direct sun
potting_tips: Keep soil moist but not soggy; high humidity preferred
common_issues: Leaves turn brown if overwatered; yellow leaves indicate underwatering

name: Lavender
description: Aromatic herb with beautiful purple flowers
watering_guide: Water when soil is dry; prefers drier conditions
sunlight_guide: Needs full sun and good air circulation
potting_tips: Use well-draining soil; trim after flowering
common_issues: Can get root rot if overwatered; needs good drainage

name: Aloe Vera
tagline: Healing plant that's almost impossible to kill!
sunlight_guide: Prefers bright indirect light; can tolerate some direct sun
potting_tips: Use cactus soil; let soil dry completely between waterings
common_issues: Very drought tolerant; overwatering causes root rot

name: Parsley
description: Biennial herb that's easy to grow
sunlight_guide: Prefers bright indirect light; can handle some direct sun
potting_tips: Use rich soil; harvest outer leaves first
common_issues: Can bolt in second year; watch for caterpillars

name: Rosemary
tagline: Woody herb that smells like the Mediterranean!
watering_guide: Water when soil is dry; prefers drier conditions
sunlight_guide: Needs full sun and good air circulation
potting_tips: Use well-draining soil; trim regularly to maintain shape
common_issues: Can get root rot if overwatered; needs good drainage

name: Lettuce
tagline: Fresh greens right from your window!
sunlight_guide: Prefers cool temperatures and indirect light
potting_tips: Harvest outer leaves; plant new seeds every few weeks
common_issues: Can bolt in hot weather; watch for slugs

name: Cilantro
sunlight_guide: Prefers cool temperatures and indirect light
potting_tips: Plant new seeds every few weeks for continuous harvest
common_issues: Can bolt quickly in hot weather; watch for aphids
